article_node.title: Spirit Airlines Files for Bankruptcy: What It Means for Travelers
article_node.summary: Spirit Airlines has filed for bankruptcy for the second time in a year, citing a fragile financial position. The airline plans to restructure its fleet and routes, focusing on stronger markets while scaling back less profitable ones. Operations will continue normally, and passengers can still book and travel. The move follows a prior restructuring that reduced debt and raised equity.
